About

Finland Studios

Our newest and greatest project! Finland Studios takes the same concept from last projects such as Jesko Film, but instead uses game development on Godot and Unity to expand to a very wide audience, instead of being locked on one platform. We imagine making fun and engaging 2D and sometimes 3D games with the community, and they will all be available for free, but you are of course welcome to donate.

Nova Kinetic Solutions

  • Nova Kinetic Solutions
  • nksdesigns5@gmail.com
  • Discord
  • WT.Social

Nova Kinetic Solutions is a project based on giving everyone a shot at making games and soon to be other subjects. Join our Discord to get in touch and see what you can do!
